StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetCandidateDependentsForPerson]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @intPersonID int ) AS
SELECT CD.DEPENDENT_ID, CD.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID, D.DEPENDENT_TYPE_DESCRIPTION, CD.LAST_NAME, CD.FIRST_NAME, CD.MIDDLE_NAME, CD.SUFFIX_CD, CD.VERIFICATION, CD.DATE_OF_BIRTH, CD.DEPENDENT_TYPE, CD.USER_LOGIN FROM [dbo].[CANDIDATE_DEPENDENT] CD WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN [dbo].[DEPENDENT] D ON (CD.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @intPersonID AND CD.DEPENDENT_TYPE = D.DEPENDENT_TYPE)
